Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 12 Kilesagocchaka » 12.6 Kilesasaṃkiliṭṭhaduka » 12.6.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Kilesagocchaka
Kilesasaṃkiliṭṭhaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
93.
4046Kileso ceva saṃkiliṭṭho ca dhammo kilesassa ceva saṃkiliṭṭhassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Navapi, tīṇiyeva padā kātabbā.)
<< Suddhaup12.6.7.2 Paccayapaccanīya >>
